list_definition.definition: to go away from and leave without help etc; to leave or abandon
to run away, usually from the army

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was shot for trying to desert.

list_definition.definition: an area of barren country, usually hot, dry and sandy, where there is very little rain

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Parts of the country are like a desert

list_ex_of_english: They sit on the least viable chunk of desert and scrub that exists.
